1-SummaryFile - create a file which contains mean parameters of MCMC analysis for multiple events (used to calculate alignments).  
2-AngularDist-Toy - toy event to test angular distribution analysis.
3-AngularDist-Exp - try angular distribution analysis on a few events. 
4-Analysis-1 - plots using analysis of 150 events where \sigma's are fixed. 
5-Analysis-2 - plots using analysis of 150 events where \sigmas are fixed 
6-Analysis-3 - plots using analysis of 150 events where \sigma's are parameters
run-hmc.jl - file that has been used to generate 150 event analysis.
